narrative.iWantTo: I can get the result of an op for two numbers

examples.step: Given a Calculator class with the operation sign as <sign>
When I give the first number as <number1>
And I give the second number as <number2>
Then I should get the result as <result>
Given a Calculator class with the operation sign as +
When I give the first number as 3
And I give the second number as 9
Then I should get the result as 12
Given a Calculator class with the operation sign as <sign>
When I give the first number as <number1>
And I give the second number as <number2>
Then I should get the result as <result>
Given a Calculator class with the operation sign as -
When I give the first number as 12
And I give the second number as 3
Then I should get the result as 9
